person._comment: This role is designed to have its alignment set after the role generation. At that time, its role, alignment, class, and defence values will be set.

single_kill.mafia: was shot by a Member of the Mafia.
single_kill.sk: was stabbed by a Serial Killer.
single_kill.arso: was burnt to a crisp by an Arsonist.
single_kill.jest: was haunted by the Jester they lynched.
single_kill.vet: was Shot by the Veteran they visited.
single_kill.vh: was stabbed by a Vampire Hunter.
single_kill.plague: was obliterated by Pestilance, Horseman of the Apocalipse.
single_kill.sorc: was shot by the Sorcerer using a Magic Bullet.
single_kill.posses: was killed by a possessed person.
single_kill.hex: was hexed by a Hex Master.
single_kill.alch: was YOLO BOMBED by an Alchemist.
single_kill.necro: was slain by a Necromancer's Ghoul.
single_kill.potion: had an evil Potion toseed at them by a Potion Master.
single_kill.merc: was killed by a Mercenary protecting their target.

multi_kill.mafia: They were also shot by a Member of the Mafia.
multi_kill.sk: They were also stabbed by a Serial Killer.
multi_kill.ww: They were also mauled by a Werewolf.
multi_kill.arso: They were also burnt to a crisp by an Arsonist.
multi_kill.vamp: They were also bitten by a Vampire.
multi_kill.jest: They were also haunted by the Jester they lynched.
multi_kill.vet: They were also shot by the Veteran they visited.
multi_kill.vig: They were also shot by a Vigilante.
multi_kill.jail: They were also executed by the Jailor.
multi_kill.guilt: They also shot themselves out of Guilt.
multi_kill.vh: They were also stabbed by a Vampire Hunter.
